dcterms:creator: R. Axelrod
W. D. Hamilton
dcterms:description: A game-theoretic model that explores the dynamics of cooperation and defection among individuals, specifically focusing on the interactions and outcomes in the Prisoners' Dilemma scenario.
dcterms:title: Prisonersâ€™ Dilemma (PD) game

dcterms:creator: C. J. Watkins
P. Dayan
dcterms:description: A reinforcement learning algorithm that enables agents to learn optimal actions based on past experiences and rewards, specifically used in the context of the Prisoners' Dilemma game.
dcterms:title: Q-learning algorithm

dcterms:creator: R. S. Sutton
A. G. Barto
dcterms:description: A comprehensive introduction to reinforcement learning, covering fundamental concepts and algorithms, including Q-learning, which is applied in the study of cooperation dynamics.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:creator: J.-Q. Zhang
S.-P. Zhang
L. Chen
X.-D. Liu
dcterms:description: A framework that integrates evolutionary game theory with reinforcement learning to analyze the dynamics of cooperation and punishment in social interactions.
dcterms:title: Evolutionary game theory framework

dcterms:creator: M. Perc
J. J. Jordan
D. G. Rand
Z. Wang
S. Boccaletti
A. Szolnoki
dcterms:description: A game that studies the dynamics of cooperation in a public goods context, highlighting the role of punishment and its effects on cooperative behavior.
dcterms:title: Public goods game

dcterms:creator: S. Lv
F. Song
dcterms:description: An optimization technique inspired by the social behavior of birds and fish, applied to enhance cooperation dynamics in evolutionary games.
dcterms:title: Particle swarm optimization

dcterms:creator: A. Bandura
R. H. Walters
dcterms:description: A theoretical framework that explains how individuals learn behaviors through observation and imitation, relevant to understanding social learning in cooperation.
dcterms:title: Social learning framework

dcterms:creator: J. Huang
dcterms:description: A collection of experimental data that investigates human behavior in social dilemmas, providing insights into cooperation and punishment.
dcterms:title: Behavioral experiments
